GapFillDragDrop.Title: Subject and object pronouns
GapFillDragDrop.Instruction: Drag the correct answers to the spaces.

Content.Question:
1. She loves shopping. I like her.
2. A: Do you like Italian food? B: Yes, I love it.
3. A: Do you like Madonna? B: Yes, I like her.
4. He watches a lot of TV. His name is Harry.
5. A: Do you like Brad Pitt? B: No, I don’t like him.
6. They’re very beautiful. I love them.
7. A: Do you love me? B: Yes, I love you.
8. They’re awful. I hate them.
9. We like him. He talks to us a lot.
10. My cat likes me.
